医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员发现与 ALS 恢复相关的关键基因变异尽管极为罕见，但一些被诊断患有肌萎缩侧索硬化症 (ALS) 的人从这种致命的神经退行性疾病中部分或完全康复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Researchers-identify-key-genic-variants-linked-to-ALS-recovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Researchers-identify-key-genic-variants-linked-to-ALS-recovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f70959f8-ec52-43c4-9db0-91a020a0e632 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 20:59:51 -0400 Researchers identify key genetic variants linked to ALS recovery
针对致癌转录因子开发潜在的新癌症治疗方法密歇根大学健康罗格尔癌症中心的一项新研究进一步表明，开发新的癌症治疗方法有可能通过间接影响致癌转录因子获取染色质中增强子 DNA 的能力来靶向致癌转录因子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Targeting-oncogenic-transcription-factors-to-develop-pottial-new-cancer-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Targeting-oncogenic-transcription-factors-to-develop-pottial-new-cancer-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b2aea1b-2797-4092-9e38-6ccc5e0b5011 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 20:52:16 -0400 Targeting oncogenic transcription factors to develop potential new cancer treatments
商业阿尔茨海默氏症血液检测的头对头比较揭示了最准确的选择神经科医生通过记忆和思维能力的临床检查来诊断认知障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Head-to-head-comparison-of-commercial-Alzheimers-blood-tests-reveals-most-accurate-options.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Head-to-head-comparison-of-commercial-Alzheimers-blood-tests-reveals-most-accurate-options.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f30836f8-bf80-4ced-95a6-58071805bb70 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 20:47:03 -0400 Head-to-head comparison of commercial Alzheimer's blood tests reveals most accurate options
用于 3D 打印功能性肺组织的新型粘液生物墨水肺部疾病每年导致全世界数百万人死亡。治疗选择有限，用于研究这些疾病的动物模型和实验药物也不充分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/New-mucus-based-bioink-for-3D-printing-function-lung-tissue.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/New-mucus-based-bioink-for-3D-printing-function-lung-tissue.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=641bb8b6-05df-4bf4-9594-58b9d04abbabb Tue, 30 Jul 2024 20:39:51 -0400 New mucus-based bioink for 3D printing functional lung tissue
综述强调了 TGF-β 和 HIPPO 通路在肝再生和疾病中的相互作用肝脏与其他器官沟通的能力对于维持体内平衡至关重要，特别是通过信号通路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Review-highlights-the-interplay-of-TGF-ceb2-and-HIPPO-pathways-in-liver-regenesis-and-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Review-highlights-the-interplay-of-TGF-ceb2-and-HIPPO-pathways-in-liver-regenesis-and-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f480a983-267d-48ac-84e7-f391b293aedf Tue, 30 Jul 2024 20:36:15 -0400 Review highlights the interplay of TGF-β and HIPPO pathways in liver regeneration and disease
应用微生物学国际 (Applied Microbiology International) 与 11 位新全球大使加强网络应用微生物学国际 (Applied Microbiology International) 宣布已招募 11 位来自世界各地的新全球大使。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Applied-Microbiology-International-strengthens-network-with-11-new-Global-Ambassadors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Applied-Microbiology-International-strengthens-network-with-11-new-Global-Ambassadors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c87f195a-2f01-4bc7-8816-ed9b7aa2​​2ad8 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 20:31:03 -0400 Applied Microbiology International strengthens network with 11 new Global Ambassadors
吸入富氢气体可减少运动引起的疲劳并提高表现《国际运动医学杂志》上发表的一项新研究《急性运动前吸入富氢气体可缓解运动疲劳》发现了一种可能针对运动引起的疲劳的新型干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Hydrogen-rich-gas-inhalation-reduces-exercise-induced-fatigue-and-enhances-performance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Hydrogen-rich-gas-inhalation-reduces-exercise-induced-fatigue-and-enhances-performance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11dfa597-4a8c-41a0-9f05-37efdc1a9160 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 20:26:39 -0400 Hydrogen-rich gas inhalation reduces exercise-induced fatigue and enhances performance
公众对人工智能生成的医疗建议持怀疑态度《自然医学》的一项研究调查了公众对基于人工智能的数字医疗建议的看法，发现人类医生的建议被认为比人工智能生成的建议更具同理心和可靠。该研究强调需要解决公众对医疗保健领域人工智能的担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Public-skepticism-of-AI- generated-medical-advice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Public-skepticism-of-AI- generated-medical-advice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efc2c666-dab6-4e3d-bc69-60c4c22435c2 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 20:25:00 -0400 Public skepticism of AI-generated medical advice
皮质微结构变化的空间模式可以作为阿尔茨海默病风险的早期指标爱思唯尔出版的《生物精神病学：认知神经科学和神经影像学》上的一项新研究结果表明，使用专门的扩散加权 MRI 扫描来监测大脑中个体皮质微结构变化的空间模式可能是一种有前途的方法来表征可能患有以下疾病的个体：在认知能力显着下降和不可逆的神经元损伤之前，很容易患上阿尔茨海默病 (AD)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Spatial-patterns-of-cortical-microstructural-change-can-be-early-indicators-of-Alzheimers-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Spatial-patterns-of-cortical-microstructural-change-can-be-early-indicators-of-Alzheimers-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3115c425-f61c-47ad-b466-fdca7ba1da10 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 20:22:21 -0400 Spatial patterns of cortical microstructural change can be early indicators of Alzheimer's disease risk
研究发现血浆生物标志物可以预测痴呆风险《美国医学会杂志》的一项研究探讨了阿尔茨海默病和心脏代谢危险因素的血浆生物标志物在预测其他类型痴呆症方面的潜力，强调了早期诊断以及将生物标志物与人口统计数据相结合以提高准确性的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Study-finds-plasma-biomarkers-can-predict-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Study-finds-plasma-biomarkers-can-predict-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1bcc4c04-c528-4fa1-896e-33b63c51bf48 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 20:14:00 -0400 Study finds plasma biomarkers can predict dementia risk
